AgentModelOption.title: AgentModelOption
AgentModelOption.description: Valid model choices for a pipeline agent.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the active section when known.

retry_count.title: Retry Count
retry_count.description: Retry attempts for the active section when applicable.

CurrentSectionStatus.title: CurrentSectionStatus
CurrentSectionStatus.description: Section status metadata for streaming job progress.

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Topic to generate a lesson for.

blueprint.title: Blueprint
blueprint.description: Optional blueprint or learning outcome guidance for lesson planning.

teaching_style.title: Teaching Style
teaching_style.description: Optional teaching style or pedagogy guidance for lesson planning.

learner_level.title: Learner Level
learner_level.description: Optional learner level hint used for prompt guidance.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: Optional list of allowed widgets (overrides defaults).

schema_version.title: Schema Version
schema_version.description: Optional schema version to pin the lesson output to.

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate lesson generation.

expected_sections.title: Expected Sections
expected_sections.description: Total number of sections expected for the lesson job (0 for non-lesson jobs).

sections.title: Sections
sections.description: 0-based section indexes to retry (defaults to all sections).

agents.title: Agents
agents.description: Pipeline agents to retry (defaults to full pipeline).

JobRetryRequest.title: JobRetryRequest
JobRetryRequest.description: Request payload for retrying a failed job.

expected_sections.title: Expected Sections
expected_sections.description: Total number of expected sections for lesson jobs.

completed_sections.title: Completed Sections
completed_sections.description: Number of lesson sections completed so far.

completed_section_indexes.title: Completed Section Indexes
completed_section_indexes.description: 0-based section indexes that have been completed so far.

retry_count.title: Retry Count
retry_count.description: Retry attempts already used for this job.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts allowed for this job.

retry_sections.title: Retry Sections
retry_sections.description: 0-based section indexes targeted for retry, when applicable.

retry_agents.title: Retry Agents
retry_agents.description: Pipeline agents targeted for retry, when applicable.

total_steps.title: Total Steps
total_steps.description: Total number of progress steps when available.

JobStatusResponse.title: JobStatusResponse
JobStatusResponse.description: Status payload for an asynchronous job.

LessonCatalogResponse.title: LessonCatalogResponse
LessonCatalogResponse.description: Response payload for lesson option metadata.

LessonMeta.title: LessonMeta
LessonMeta.description: Metadata about the lesson generation process.

gatherer_model.title: Gatherer Model
gatherer_model.description: Model used for the gatherer agent (provider inferred when possible).

planner_model.title: Planner Model
planner_model.description: Model used for the planner agent (provider inferred when possible).

structurer_model.title: Structurer Model
structurer_model.description: Model used for lesson structuring (provider inferred when possible).

repairer_model.title: Repairer Model
repairer_model.description: Model used for repair validation and fixes (provider inferred when possible).

OptionDetail.title: OptionDetail
OptionDetail.description: Metadata describing an option with tooltip guidance.

ValidationResponse.title: ValidationResponse
ValidationResponse.description: Response model for lesson validation results.

text.title: Text
text.description: The user-written response to check (max 300 words).

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.description: The evaluation criteria from the lesson.

checker_model.title: Checker Model
checker_model.description: Optional model override for writing evaluation (provider inferred when possible).
